home.title: Professional Clean Service
home.description: Our professional cleaning service is designed to meet all your hygiene and maintenance needs, in both residential and commercial settings. With a highly trained team and the use of high quality cleaning products, we guarantee impeccable and long-lasting results

services.title: Contract cleaning services
services.description: The planned activities will be carried out according to the following operation scheme, ensuring the correct execution and fulfillment of each established task:

service-1.title: Office Cleaning
service-1.description: We have a comprehensive cleaning service for closed work environments.

service-2.title: Dining Room Cleaning
service-2.description: We offer general cleaning service in dining areas ideal for a good presentation.

service-3.title: Cleaning at Heights
service-3.description: We have specialized personnel to carry out the cleaning of these surfaces, both interior and exterior, we offer personnel with safety equipment and professional experience.

service-4.title: Room Cleaning
service-4.description: Chair cleaning is focused on the absolute elimination of dust mites, in addition to recovering the color and beauty of your chair, something that due to the cutting-edge methods we use, we are able to achieve from the first visit.

service-5.title: Carpet Cleaning
service-5.description: Our service helps lift dust and stains to the surface, which facilitates the removal of dirt using our injection-suction technique.

service-6.title: Gardening
service-6.description: The maintenance of gardens, patios or green roofs is necessary to enjoy their appearance. We put our service at your disposal to guarantee good condition and safety.

service-7.title: Sanitations
service-7.description: We fight 99.99% of germs through nanotechnology. This process ensures the disinfection of the air and the surfaces of furniture, walls and objects.

service-8.title: Product sale
service-8.description: We always use the best quality products on the market and with the lowest environmental impact, adapted to the needs of each client.

activities.li2: Uniformed personnel identified with a badge

about.title: About us
about.description: At Dista Clean, we are passionately dedicated to providing exceptional cleaning services that meet our clients' needs with integrity, professionalism, and efficiency. We strive to deliver top-notch solutions tailored to each customer, ensuring a pristine and healthy environment for homes and businesses alike.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become a Strategic Solution for our clients, becoming the best option, with a solid culture of service and trust.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To make Dista Clean the best Business Partner, providing quality services and solutions with the best technology according to the needs of our clients.

contact.title: Contact Us.
contact.description: Welcome to our contact page. Here, you can contact us with any queries, suggestions or requests for additional information. Our team is available to help you and ensure that all your questions are answered in a timely manner.
